postStartCommand: for i in $(seq $(losetup -ln | wc -l) $(($(losetup -ln | wc -l) + 16))); do rm -rf /dev/loop$i; mknod -m0660 /dev/loop$i b 7 $i; chown root.disk /dev/loop$i; done && git submodule update --init --recursive && envsubst < .devcontainer/default.yaml > ~/.config/jumpstarter/clients/default.yaml && rm -f ~/.config/jumpstarter/config.yaml && cp .devcontainer/config.yaml ~/.config/jumpstarter/config.yaml
